title: Sampler, 1712
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, long-armed cross, back, satin, eyelet, chain, four-sided, and threaded Gobelin stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Alphabets, isolated motifs, and large ship in the middle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1712.
1712. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, long-armed cross, back, satin, eyelet, chain, four-sided, and threaded Gobelin stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-221.
